characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.backstory: Orphaned at a young age, Harry discovers he is a wizard on his eleventh birthday. He attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where he faces various challenges, including defeating the dark wizard Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Arya Stark
characters.backstory: Arya is the third child and younger daughter of Eddard and Catelyn Stark. After witnessing the execution of her father, she travels across Westeros and Essos, training to become a skilled assassin and seeking revenge against those who wronged her family.

characters.name: Sherlock Holmes
characters.backstory: Sherlock Holmes is a brilliant consulting detective residing in London. He solves various complex criminal cases with the help of his trusted friend, Dr. John Watson.
characters.source: Sherlock TV series / Sherlock Holmes stories

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.backstory: A Muggle-born witch, Hermione is one of Harry Potter's best friends. She is known for her academic prowess and often assists Harry and Ron in their adventures.

characters.name: Frodo Baggins
specialAbilities: Resistance to the power of the One Ring
characters.backstory: Frodo is a hobbit from the Shire tasked with the perilous quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the dark lord Sauron.
characters.source: The Lord of the Rings film trilogy

characters.name: Katniss Everdeen
characters.backstory: Katniss is from District 12 in the dystopian world of Panem. She volunteers for the Hunger Games to protect her younger sister Prim and becomes a symbol of rebellion against the oppressive Capitol.

characters.name: Luke Skywalker
characters.backstory: Luke is the son of Anakin Skywalker (Darth Vader) and Padm√© Amidala. He becomes a key figure in the Rebel Alliance's fight against the Galactic Empire and trains as a Jedi under Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda.

otherFeatures: Tattoo of a sun on his right shoulder

characters.name: Elizabeth Bennet
characters.backstory: Elizabeth is the protagonist of Jane Austen's novel Pride and Prejudice. She navigates societal expectations and romantic entanglements in Regency-era England.

characters.name: Captain Jack Sparrow
characters.backstory: Captain Jack Sparrow is a notorious pirate known for his eccentric personality and unconventional methods. He sails the Caribbean in search of treasure and adventure.
characters.source: Pirates of the Caribbean film series

characters.name: Princess Leia Organa
characters.backstory: Princess Leia is a member of the Rebel Alliance and a key figure in the fight against the Galactic Empire. She is known for her bravery, intelligence, and determination.

characters.name: James Bond
characters.backstory: James Bond, also known by his code number 007, is a British Secret Service agent known for his suave demeanor, resourcefulness, and ability to outwit his adversaries.

characters.name: Bilbo Baggins
characters.backstory: Bilbo is Frodo Baggins' uncle and the protagonist of J.R.R. Tolkien's novel The Hobbit. He embarks on an unexpected journey to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from the dragon Smaug.

characters.name: Wonder Woman
characters.backstory: Wonder Woman, also known as Diana Prince, is an Amazonian warrior princess and one of the founding members of the Justice League. She fights for justice, love, and equality.
characters.source: Wonder Woman film series / DC Comics
